## Introductions

Quarto supports different formats for creating presentations:

- `revealjs` - revealjs (HTML)
- `pptx` - PowerPoint (MS Office)
- `beamer` - Beamer (LaTeX/PDF)

 most capable format by far is `revealjs`.
